name: faceball
description:
the first and probably last game you play with your face!

collect powerups, bump into things, smash peaches, avoid brainballs and radioactivity.  all with your face.

this game requires the unity face capture companion app running on iPhone

https://apps.apple.com/us/app/unity-face-capture/id1544159771

( alternatively: wasd for control, q and e to rotate camera, space to jump and shift for turbo. It's easier to control with keyboard, but way less fun)

get your iPhone and your PC on the same WIFI, start the game and the companion app on your phone. The companion app on your phone will search for a server, and the game on PC will start a server whewn the game starts (server settings are in the top left corner of the main menu screen - hit restart to change ports).

Once connected you can use the facial motion capture to control the game.

Quality settings are in the top right corner of the menu screen. On low-ish settings, this should run on a potatoe.
